text: Janelle M. Burke is a botanist in the US. She has been affiliated with Cornell University and Howard University. She specializes in plant systematics and plant evolutionary biology of Polygonaceae. This author is usually abbreviated «Jan.M.Burke» when citing a botanical name. ==Works== -& Adriana Sanchez 2011 Revised subfamily classification for Polygonaceae with a tribal classification for Eriogonoideae Brittonia 63(4): 510–520. ==References== Category:American botanists Category:Scientists from California Category:Cornell University faculty
title: Janelle M. Burke
